short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Your AutoScout24 Search Results with Ease!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AS Export browser extension allows you to easily export and download AutoScout24 search results as CSV, JSON, and XLSX files, making data management and analysis easy.

It's completely free and has no limits: you can export all 2 million offers from AutoScout24 if you want, but of course you'll have to wait several hours.

Exporting 1000 results takes approximately 30 seconds.

File generation works in two modes:
1. For search results up to 400, you only need to wait up to 30 seconds for the automatic download. Keep the side panel open to avoid interrupting the process!
2. For results over 400, you only need to wait up to 5 minutes. You can close the side panel and a download link will magically appear when ready.

Your feedback is very valuable to me. Email me with any suggestions/improvements you have in mind!
